name: Bath Time (benjamm22)
description:
In this Western in-browser thriller, you play as Slippin' Slidin' Sammy Two Shoes in his quest to maintain his dignity and honor as a cowboy. Your mission is simple - avoid the oncoming bathtubs and soap bars! The more you avoid, the more come your way - and the FASTER they come! How long can you stave off a scrubbin'? 

Ludum Dare 50 submission. All assets minus music are made from scratch in the time frame of the game-jam.

Lead Programmer - Mr.Dandro

Lead 3D Artist - Benjamm

Lead 2D Artist - Zeefaux

Song - Traveling with Corina - Remastered by Lobo Loco

Song discovered by - Kimikyu
